statuscounter.rebindNumberKeys.name: Rebind number keys
statuscounter.rebindNumberKeys.hint: Overrides the default number key assignment when hovering a status marker to set the amount of stacks.
statuscounter.rebindMouseButtons.name: Rebind mouse buttons
statuscounter.rebindMouseButtons.hint: Overrides the default mouse button behavior to increase the stack count with left click and decrease it with right click. The status overlay can be set with Shift + Left click.
statuscounter.displayOne.name: Display '1'
statuscounter.displayOne.hint: Configures when/if the counter should be displayed for a single stack.
statuscounter.counterFontSize.name: Counter font size
statuscounter.counterFontSize.hint: The font size of the status counter.
statuscounter.counterColor.name: Counter color
statuscounter.counterColor.hint: The color of the status counter in RRGGBB format.
statuscounter.countdownColor.name: Countdown color
statuscounter.countdownColor.hint: The color of combat countdowns in RRGGBB format.
